website_summaries.verdict: If portability is an important shopping factor, this folding comb is one to consider. Not for full, thick beards, but ideal for mustaches and short beards.
pros: Teeth size and spacing are highly praised
Curved blade delivers even wax distribution
cons: Awkward combing angle compared to non-folding models
Works better on mustaches than full beards

customer_reviews.title: Its a Kent comb.
customer_reviews.text: It is the quality of all the Kent combs, however the flip aspect is a little lacking. I was hoping something along the lines of a pocket knife, easy to flip open, locks open and locks closed. But this is just a hinge, nothing to keep it in place, or help it swing open. The plastic case is also flexible making it very tough to open and close. Also a little short for my liking, both in length and depth of the teeth. Updated to 1 star as they do not accept returns, makes me really disappointed as I wanted a beard comb wouldnt mind this for a mustache comb, but its just not large enough for a beard.
customer_reviews.author: BuyerR

customer_reviews.title: Highly Disappointed Dollar Store Junk
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today, I like the size but it has some serious flaws. For a $14 comb it feels like a dollar store piece of junk. 2 of the teeth are stuck together from a bad mold, the gold paint wore off in less than 6 hours and the joint where the the comb folds is loose. For a Kent that is supposed to be the best, I’m HIGHLY disappointed. Almost makes me think this is a counterfeit it’s so bad. Only thing nice is the size, just wish it had some quality materials and workmanship instead of obvious Chinese junk.
customer_reviews.author: DAK

customer_reviews.title: I really like this come specially for the mustache hairs very fine ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this come specially for the mustache hairs very fine small teeth... I would rent recommend mostly using this for mustache only... But I like the design and the quality of these combs... I had purchased two of them, one for my car, and one for me to carry in my pocket... I would highly recommend this comb to all my friends and strangers alike... And the best part of all no more broken teeth on my combs... Thank you so very much excellent product! .
customer_reviews.author: John D Yashura

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pocket mustache comb.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from another vendor and it never came took a couple of months to get my money back. Found it again from this vendor and got it in a couple days. Was worried about durability carrying it in my pocket everyday. Have had it awhile now and durability is great nothing wrong with comb or hinge. The gold paint has mostly wore off that's about it. I use it to comb my stache after applying wax and it works great. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bajeba

customer_reviews.title: Great pocket comb
customer_reviews.text: Great little comb! Like one reviewer pointed out, it is about the size of a Chapstick/Lip Balm thingy. I have a goatee that I am letting go nuts, and this combs through it nicely. The fine teeth easily comb through my coarse beard. One reviewer mentioned that the pointy end pokes his chin so he was going to grind it off. I don't know what that's about! Put in your right hand, comb left side, put it in your left hand, comb right side. ;)
customer_reviews.author: S. HYANS

customer_reviews.title: NOT a beard comb.
customer_reviews.text: The item description is a tad bit off. There's no way this thing is feasible for use with a beard. I should have paid more attention to the dimensions, because this comb is about the size of something you'd find in a Barbie dress up kit. This is my first plastic Kent comb, thought I'd give it a chance after hearing so many people say good things about them. They might be great for some beards, just not mine. It feels like it's shattering my hair's on a molecular level. Back to a wooden one for me.
customer_reviews.author: nsparks

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the curvature of the teeth
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it works. I don't like the curvature of the teeth, and especially don't like the tip. It digs in to your skin when trying to comb. I cut it off, and it's much better, but I'd prefer a straight edge versus the curved. It's just difficult to use in some areas when you have to drag the base across your face just to get the teeth in there. That said, I like the size, and still use it all day, keeping it in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: bathtub-gin

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Best comb I've had.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. While folded, it has the perfect size to fit in your pocket, but unfolded is perfect to fit your hand. It feels nice on the beard, and is well made and seems really durable. The only downside is that the golden letters seem to erase really easily. Comparing it to previous, and cheaper, combs I've owned and used before, undoubtedly, this is the best I've used.
customer_reviews.author: V. H. T. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great as a portable mustache comb!
customer_reviews.text: Great product - it's a small comb to the point I carry it in my pocket. Downside is it's so small that I have dropped it a few times when taking out my keys or smartphone. The comb is very sturdy (hasn't broken from any drops). Since I do carry it in my pocket the label has gotten a few scuffs. It's a great mustache comb overall, just be sure to use some beard oil (or mustache wax).
customer_reviews.author: Roll_DMG

customer_reviews.title: Great MUSTACHE comb!
customer_reviews.text: Before I purched this item I noticed the term Mustache combo or Mustache mentioned, about 5 times in the description. Plus this item is often sold with, wait for it....Mustache Wax. So the poor reviews that this comb is too small for beards, is a bit of a puzzle to me. That said, this is one Great Mustache comb. My Mustache now looks fantastic, my wife even mentioned how my Mustache appears more tailored and I will recommend this product to my buddies who have Mustaches.
customer_reviews.author: kh

customer_reviews.title: Are they made by Kent?
customer_reviews.text: The comb was poorly made. It cannot be unfolded without exerting too much force. I have bought a similar one a few weeks ago. That one also was a little sticky when opening it but not like this one. I thought I was unlucky with my first purchase and decided to buy a second (I could always make use of two combs); but now I’m thinking that I was lucky the fist time. These Combs ought to be perfect if made by Kent.....huh!. I should write to Kent and find out. I’m going to return it.... oh ,the pain of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Great product love Kent combs
customer_reviews.text: had this product over a year now, as always top quality from kent. I love it and carry it everyday! It is perfect for beard and stashes. I have worn off most of the gold lettering rubbing around in my pocket with other junk, but otherwise it's still in perfect condition. Teeth are incredibly strong considering how fine they are, and the foldable design protects them perfectly. Also enough tension in the rivet to keep it closed all day in your pocket but still easily opens.
customer_reviews.author: Reece

customer_reviews.title: Great comb...carries like it's not even there!
customer_reviews.text: Great pocket comb for your beard and 'stash. Folds nicely to fit unobtrusively in your jeans coin pocket...yet gives full size comb results! Handmade so the quality is there. I like it, so will you!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Strack

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and functional
customer_reviews.text: Function-wise, It's great. I like the fact that the end sticks out from the case for easy opening. The teeth are smooth...no scratching. The case also prevents wax from getting on your clothing. My only gripe is that the gold stamp is very shallow and wears off quickly. This doesn't affect the quality of the comb at all, but it does cheapen its looks.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Mosca

customer_reviews.title: it would be just as easy to open if it it was the same length ...
customer_reviews.text: That edge at the exposed end of the comb does rub against your skin in a noticeable way. No idea why that's there, it would be just as easy to open if it it was the same length as the teeth. Still, it's a good travel sized comb and I'm overall happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good little pocket comb that has some style
customer_reviews.text: A good little pocket comb that has some style. Friends always comment when I pull it out. It's definitely a fine toothed comb I would recommend for a mustache but probably not a beard,,,if you care....
customer_reviews.author: Chap Hannich

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of every day carry
customer_reviews.text: Good size and durable. I carried this everyday when I was supporting my mustache. It distributed wax nicely and even fixed my hair in a few cases. I can see how some people wouldn't like the curve, but I had no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Poli

customer_reviews.title: and feel of the comb is great. It would be 5 stars if it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Comb is too small for Amy taste. Stylistically, the construction, look, and feel of the comb is great. It would be 5 stars if it was a couple of inches longer. I ended up purchasing the 3 pack of combs
customer_reviews.author: CFT

customer_reviews.title: Best comb I’ve found yet.
customer_reviews.text: This is really the first pocket comb I have found that doesn’t feel like it teases the mustache. These teeth glide smoothly through my mustache.
customer_reviews.author: darrin boykin

customer_reviews.title: Great pocket comb
customer_reviews.text: Nice small pocket friendly mustache comb. I always keep it in my pocket just in case I need to touch up my mustache. The construction is very rigid.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Will not close
customer_reviews.text: It's a great mustache comb if I could only get it to close back up.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier than what it costs
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a gift for a well-mustached family member. Every time we visit, he flips it out of his pocket, flicks the comb open, and runs it through both sides of his ‘stache. It does not seem cheap, but it was very affordable, especially as a fun gift for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: TWC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beard comb!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful comb! My husband has a short beard and this perfect. It fits nicely in his pocket and he carries it all the time. Very fast shipping and arrived nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great comb
customer_reviews.text: Great mustache comb, fits in small pocket of jeans, teeth are perfect length
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great comb. This is a replacement to my first ...
customer_reviews.text: Great comb. This is a replacement to my first one that I lost. I carry and use it daily. Teeth are protected from being broken from other things in pocket. If I lose this one, I will buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Wilton Luke

customer_reviews.title: Really like this design
customer_reviews.text: Small, foldable, and just the right size to get my mustache tamed. Really like this design, the other foldable Kent I have I loved but was much bigger than this bad boy. I much prefer this smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Solid Scot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on the go comb! Convenient for the pocket or keychain!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then I anticipated but overall it's a great comb! Works better as a mustache comb in my opinion but It also works great for detailing the beard as well!

customer_reviews.title: Nice comb
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I was looking for, a small pocket knife style comb for my mustache.
customer_reviews.author: Danny D

customer_reviews.title: I like the size and the comb
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and the comb, until it touches my beard. Your hair gets caught in the fold and brass ring holding it together. So it makes combing your beard not very pleasurable.
customer_reviews.author: josh vicente

customer_reviews.title: This comb would be fine for moustaches and goatees
customer_reviews.text: This comb would be fine for moustaches and goatees, but not beards. The comb is small, but he curve makes it uneven when you try to use it. When you’re conbing the sides of your beard the edge scraps your face and the teeth don’t hit evenly. Not sure why this has such high ratings. Worst of all...can’t return it!
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Besrd brush
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my beard I have, I like that it is very compact and portable. Awesome comb for beard grooming
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Riccardi

customer_reviews.title: Great little comb
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this little comb. He keeps it in his pocket. The fold up feature keeps it safe from breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact beard comb
customer_reviews.text: My husband isn't always losing his beard combs but we keep buying this one over and over. It's so compact and fits perfect in his pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Lisa Hensel

customer_reviews.title: Too small to be usefull
customer_reviews.text: I understand that this is a travel comb, but this thing is tiny! It might possibly be good for a mustache , but the teeth are too short for any hair that's much more than 1/4 in
customer_reviews.author: Johnny59020

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but over-priced
customer_reviews.text: Fairly stout quality, and good size, but the hinge is pretty tight (tho will probably loosen with use) & the edges are rough/unfinished in areas. Not slick enough quality to warrant the price... But gifted this to my boyfriend and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: hatter

customer_reviews.title: Keep it clean on the go, with the smallest compact design.
customer_reviews.text: Love how compact this is. Fits in the tiny Jean pocket space and works like all Kent’s master products.
customer_reviews.author: BookWormInternational

customer_reviews.title: Sweet comb! Fits in any pocket
customer_reviews.text: Sweet comb! Fits in any pocket. Perfect size to take everywhere, and it works great! I have a bunch of combs and brushes that are great for my beard - but I had the hardest time finding a comb for the stash! Great job gang!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: but hubby likes it and it fits nicely into his pockets
customer_reviews.text: smaller than i wanted... but hubby likes it and it fits nicely into his pockets.

customer_reviews.title: Good Comb
customer_reviews.text: Good comb. Can take it with you anywhere. Super small.

customer_reviews.title: Small and edges are hard and sharp
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected, small, rough on skin and way over priced.

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality
customer_reviews.text: Very handy to have in the pocket. Nicely made old school high quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great comb
customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact. Fits in the pocket perfectly and glides through with no problem.

customer_reviews.title: Good Comb
customer_reviews.text: Good Comb, I use it everyday. Wish you could lock it in the extended position as it likes to swing partway closed when using it.

customer_reviews.title: Great comb for mustache or goatee.
customer_reviews.text: Kent makes fine combs. This purchase is my third in their lineup. However, with a medium length beard it doesn't quite cover as well as say a mustache or goatee.

customer_reviews.title: More of a status symbol than added function.
customer_reviews.text: Cool comb, but no more functional that a cheap black comb.

customer_reviews.title: Good mustache comb
customer_reviews.text: Good mustache comb, bit smaller folded then the regular model mustache comb from kent but unfolded gives you a bit more length to work with although if you don't wipe the wax off I feel this can get gunked up with wax pretty good if that's your intended use.

customer_reviews.text: Great comb, just a little small for the beard. works perfect for the stash

customer_reviews.text: Great combination for keeping in your pocket. Very fine and we'll made. I would highly recommended

customer_reviews.text: This 87T folding comb is small and convenient, it glides right through my beard and moustache with ease, especially the stache, then folds to fit in my jeans coin pocket without a hitch. Thanks!

customer_reviews.text: I have several beard combs and this is my favorite for function and form. It works well and folds small enough to fit in the coin pocket of my jeans.

customer_reviews.text: Very nice and small size. Strong and not flimzy material. I liked its color too. I would buy it again for sure.

customer_reviews.title: They finally came out with a great size folding mustache comb

customer_reviews.title: Kents are the ultimate facial hair combs.  Unsurpassed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend who is always changing up his facial hair. I've also used a Kent comb in the past when I've grown my beard and mustache longer. I will say this. These darn things are pretty much indestructible. They fold up so they are about as compact as a comb could ever be and you would be surprised how quickly they can turn a scraggly, unkempt bear into a neat looking bit of grooming. If you need a beard or mustache comb you seriously cannot do better than these. Period.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Kilroy

product_meta.title: Kent 87T Pocket Comb Beard Comb for Mustache and Beard - Travel Kit Sized Beard Comb for Grooming/Beard Care - Fine Tooth Comb Mustache Comb Kent Comb for Mustache Kit Beard Grooming Styling Comb
product_meta.description: Size:1- PackABOUT KENT'S HANDMADE COMBS: Kent Handmade Combs for Men and Women Range are of excellent quality. Kent hand sawn combs are cut from large sheets of cellulose acetate rather than molded, producing a truly gentle comb whereas molded combs often snag and damage the hair. This material is tactile, flexible and strong. They glide effortlessly through hair without scratching to damaging the hair or scalp. Kent combs have rounded teeth which ensure a smooth and comfortable action. The range includes designs for thick and fine hair, in varying sizes, for both men and women. About Kent: Founded in 1777, Kent Brushes is the world's oldest hairbrush manufacturer and has maintained its British traditions of producing the world's finest hairbrushes and combs ever since. Making the best quality brushes for over 230 years and creating over 250 products. Quality, design and attention to detail go into each brush. They have been the holders of The Royal Warrant through the last nine consecutive reigns of British monarchy. The company continues to retain the craftsmanship and unprecedented quality that is Kent's reputation.Even in today's fast moving, mass-produced assembly lines, they are proud to still be manufacturing many of their original brushes by hand.
feature_bullets: POCKET SIZE: 2.5" FIne Tooth comb beard straightening comb and mustache comb for the perfect beard grooming kit for men. This travel sized Kent comb for mustache & beard, so you can groom your facial hair anytime, anywhere.

EFFORTLESS GLIDE: This saw cut, fine tooth comb, is hand polished and buffed to create soft rounded teeth that will stimulate your scalp or skin. Microscopically smooth teeth stimulate the natural oil inside the hair cuticles as your hair is combed.

HANDMADE KENT BEARD COMB: Handmade from cellulose acetate, a non-petroleum based plastic derived from plants that has been found to create less static in hair, and is saw-cut to ensure a smooth surface that will not pull or snag hair follicles.

ROYALLY RECOGNIZED SINCE 1777: Kent started out as G. B. Kent & Sons PLC back in 1777 as a family owned business. Today, Kent is the world's oldest brush manufacturer as well as one of the oldest companies in Great Britain. Proudly displaying the Royal Warrant of Her Majesty the Queen, Kent continues to make high-quality products; including hair brushes, combs, makeup brushes, body brushes, shaving brushes, and clothing brushes. Experience the quality that has continued for 240 years.

MOUSTACHE COMBS COLLECTION: The Kent range has evolved over generations to include brushes for all hair types and all styling techniques. Brushing hair is also about lifestyle and fashion, and Kent meets these needs by introducing new ranges to match new demands. At Kent, there is a brush for everyone; for her, for him, for kids, even for your teeth!
